name: dracer2
text: The underwear has made Todd rude and raunchy.

name: natjo1986
text: A comment left by natjo1986 was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by Moolah, farqussus, bearealcoolhand, scraggg)

name: seven47
text: I bet the only reason he ate the underwear is because it is a code word.

name: jesler729
text: Haha oh wow. I feel really stupid now.

name: twohundredninety
text:
I thought so at first, too, but now I'm not sure. Ray says "whale tail-ectomy" in the last panel. It seems weird for him to refer a specific type of underwear if the word "underwear" itself is code.

On the other hand, the whole thing in general makes more sense if you read "underwear" to mean "coke."

name: spinynorman
text:
It was an act of love. We will never know anything so beautiful.

Eating underwear is so beautiful

name: peterjoel
text: Air stewardesses get pretty pissed if they suspect you've eaten any amount of underwear.

name: jthompson
text:
Don't call them stewardesses. They get mad at you if you call them that. I was told (very nastily) by one that they are called "Flight Attendants."

Also I learned that although they'll give you a blanket they will NOT tuck you in. Weird huh?

name: robobogle
text: Can you think of anyone who has a more gigantic and deep-seated fury at the world?

name: jthompson
text: Huh. Good point.

name: peterjoel
text: Pat?

name: jthompson
text: References are better when people get them, I guess.

name: mirzabah
text: Shhh. I get the reference. Don't you worry.

name: soticoto
text: *Waves*

name: peterjoel
text: A comment left by peterjoel was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by crawfomp, behka, zulko)

name: vincentkv
text: Also, don't call them "Air Mattresses".

name: lahnnabell
text: Chubby for your Cassidy icon. ;)

name: dacapn
text: bro your avatar is fuckn me up!!! i stare and stare but i swear to GOD everytime i glance away the eyes look away and back.... god help me i may have sniffed too much underwear

name: juanclaudius
text: Ray Smuckles Gets Things Done. I'm sure he means three minutes in that last panel, which just proves it.

name: dr_manflesh_desires_anal_play_immediately
text: AIRWOLF IS FASTER THAN ANY JET

name: tombsgrave
text: A comment left by tombsgrave was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by hargbarf, robbingdog, mrobin604, peterjoel)

name: pyromancer
text: Hell of copter

name: tombsgrave
text: Yours > > > > > > > mine.

name: jawsh
text: if i could only give one more comment on this site a chubby this would have been it

name: atticusonline
text: Heelacopter

name: avedestron
text: I really can't look at any squirrels the same way because of todd.

name: gumfish
text: A comment left by gumfish was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by Absurdist, trapperjohn, dirtyonethirty)

name: lateadopter
text: I've looked at squirrels from both sides now.

name: gothfae
text: Chip and Dale were Chipmunks. I fail to see how they affected your Human:Squirrel realtions.

name: gumfish
text: The Norwegian term for chipmunk directly translates to "Earth Squirrel" I guess I got confused.

name: jthompson
text: You're all nuts.

name: fell
text: ba dum pshh

name: twoply
text: Ever since I watched a squirrel down a flake from a 99 cone I've been waiting for this moment. Underwear is a cousin to the flake!

name: axhoola
text: According to this article, an ice cream cone is known in the trade as a "frozen dairy platform"!

name: wae
text:
It's a recognized public health problem in cities like DC and NYC that squirrels dig up crack in city parks (stashed by dealers) and then go nuts trying to dig up more crack. They become aggressive, nervous and hyperactive, just like Full-Size Crackheads.
I think that's probably the most hilarious public health problem I've ever heard of.

name: ttagxamm
text: A comment left by ttagxamm was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by stormypinkness, farqussus, behka, dr_sexlove)

name: wae
text:
No. This is a discussion forum about a cartoon on the internet. It is funny whether it is true or not (of course it's an urban legend).

And you just challenged me for a citation. On a discussion forum about a squirrel over-dosing on underwear and performing surgery on himself with a restaurant.

name: ttagxamm
text: A comment left by ttagxamm was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by madnes, dreamydeary, dr_sexlove)

name: zefiel
text:
Two men. 3,000 page views a day.

Watch man destroy thought in the

GREAT INTERNET FIGHT

name: wae
text: The appropriateness of my avatar seems to have emboldened me today. Chubbies all around.

name: ttagxamm
text: Also, your second paragraph is maybe funnier to me than the last panel of the strip itself.

name: ttagxamm
text: The Truth Shall Make You Lame, jeez.

name: rhadamanthus
text: Just a silly myth perpetuated by tabloid mags in the UK that have been on a staunch anti-drug crusade (what with their invention of "superskunk") in recent months.

name: neonfreon
text: A comment left by neonfreon was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by banjothepony, straw, madnes, Unfun, HassanOLeary, fosters, Triactry03, ntopp, solobuttons, Spenham, michellemarie, ElZilcho, TheGreatestCape, Ikrizzle, foea)

name: solobuttons
text: thanks for that

name: lereya
text:
I was so certain that the first monkey wrench would involve cocaine.

Well-played, Onstad. Well-played.

name: projectyl
text: Next: The lawsuit against the dangerously sharp Emeril Lagasse franchise is jeopardized when Todd's opening arguments consist of a single inappropriate word shrieked repeatedly.

name: rowboat
text: Balls?

name: lereya
text: Also, this strip could stand on its own with just the first four panels.  Genius.

name: thedudeabides85
text:
For the purer souls on this messageboard:

Jelqing

name: stuart
text: It should be stated this is in reference to the alt text.

name: solobuttons
text: Haha, I'm glad someone else got the reference. Jelqing is hilarious.

name: biztsar
text: I didn't get it, and I googled jelq-con. and became frustrated that there was no such thing.

name: wae
text:
I'm curious, but not as curious as my employers would be when "altpenis.com" shows up on the server history.

Later. I will learn about Jelqing later.

name: ntopp
text: I find it curious that just by referencing jelqing, you've well increased number of chubbies. That's very appropriate.

name: ntopp
text: And HTML stabs me in the back once more!

name: hastooo
text: Submitted for your approval: a rat eats his trousers.

name: elzilcho
text: ...Someone help me out on the last panel? I tried to piece it together with Google and contextual clues, but um... unless Todd underwent surgery to remove his thong by way of flinging himself into a sharpened restaurant, I have no clue what Ray is talking about.

name: stuart
text: Todd just tried to surgically remove an eaten thong using the corner of a building instead of a scalpel.

name: godfatherofsouls
text: I took it to mean he puked on Emeril's restaurant.

name: godfatherofsouls
text: fuck. sharpened corner. i'm Lame.

name: elzilcho
text: It's disturbing how close I was.

name: stuart
text: Next time you board a plane, tell the TSA people you ate a pair of underwear and see what happens.

name: brycemidas
text: I am getting on a plane tomorrow at 10AM after today being chock full of midterms, I am tempted to do such nonsensical things.

name: snatch22
text: Until the last panel I assumed underwear was slang for coke.  Even though it wasn't, it is now.

name: pebohead
text: Ray saying "Thats It?" in the third panel makes me wonder why Ray knows what a safe level of underwear consumption is.

name: chuvak
text: YES. Underwear = my new slang for coke. No more references to "skiing snow topped peaks". A whole new world is opening. "Hey, you wearing underwear today?" ("you holding?"). "Yeah man, BOXERS" (Totally, and I have some for sale, not just for personal use"). Alternately "It's been bikini briefs since I got fired from Peppers, dude."

name: songbirdspectre
text: The squirrel's stomach muffles the sound of the eaten underpants.

name: rumblefish
text: The cat is unimpressed by the volume of underwear consumed by the squirrel.

name: barthexderosa
text:
I can hear underwear, even when it's inside of you.
It sounds uncannily like Jerry Seinfeld.

I'm not even a stewardess.

name: love_hz
text: Ray is a captain?

name: biff
text:
He has a captain's outfit.

He has many different professional and cultural outfits.

He could perform YMCA all by himself.

Not that he'd want to.

name: phy
text: It would take him a while. He'd have to switch costumes every syllable.

name: norrin
text: He had his own flight service for a while. I'm sure if you wait patiently someone better than me will link you to it.

name: wae
text: Oh those weren't just your ordinary flights

name: halofyre
text: He looks just like John Travolta in that uniform. I bet he doesn't buy carbon offsets either.

name: peterjoel
text: I like how, in the previous strip of the arc, Teodor gently tries to bring Todd back to reality. Fuck that. Now he's right there with the camera.

name: brycemidas
text: The squirrel is so high he ate his own underwear.

name: whoopysnorp
text: Somebody did the old 'what were you eating under there' joke to Todd and it gave him ideas.

name: ntopp
text:
"What'cha eatin' under there?"
"Un-under where?"
"Ha ha. You're eating und-"
"I JUST F-F-FUCKEN TOLD YOU. CHRIST. P-Pass me that thong. I n-need something for this fucken f-flight."

name: just_a_dude
text: Underwear can only be silenced through consumption.

name: stayawaystars
text: Ever since that helicopter-blades strip, I keep picturing these Ray-on-the-phone strips as conversations with his mom. Which is more than a little terrifying.

name: teira
text: Oh no! He took ray's advice and spent it all on his nose!

name: sargasm
text: Underwear is a Schedule I controlled substance

name: absurdist
text: I once downed some undies as a kid. I was all hell of buggin' out. Still, to this day I've got to go to weekly therapy. Todd is doing the only thing a sensible man would do.

name: epicurus
text:
This strip has so much to offer me.

That's it?

No one can hear underwear once it's inside of you!

name: fjak
text: the cat needs to save his squirrel friend from cutting himself open with emeril-brand knives.

name: judahnielsen
text: I guess Teodor doesn't have a lot to do today. He's just going to stand there with the camera for the next four hours.

name: clever-nickname
text: am i alone in thinking that "whale tail-ectomy" is a hell of clever joke

name: rawk5tar
text: From the first sentence I figured Todd was on the line.

name: rowboat
text: Oh, he was on "the line," alright. Several, actually.

name: nochmal
text: Have we actually got the final word on Todd's geographical progeny, his ancestral grounds, his stirps, his radix? I envision vomiting of pantyhose.

name: dueledge
text:
Bill Bailey was right, squirrels are total druggies.

I am now unsure whether "underwear" was code in this strip

name: cpnglxynchos
text: i found it rather amazing that Todd was able to bounce back so well for his show.

name: fannin
text: Squires will never be the same in my book, and I will never call a Flight Attendant the "S" Word. LOL what is Jelqing anyway, the only info I could find on it was on AltPenis and here does it actually mean enlarging the penis by stretching OUCH!!!

name: themolt
text: Bill Waterson would have signed in panel 3.
